scripts.turboreset: docker compose down --rmi all -v && docker compose up
scripts.install: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ..

scripts.db:stop: cd database && docker compose down && cd ..

scripts.db:reset: cd database && docker compose down --rmi all -v && docker compose up -d && cd ..
